name: Dragon 3D
description:
Welcome to the world of Dragon 3D! Below I will state what is already in the game and what will be added in the future. I won't be gauranteeing anything as things might change during development and I don't want to be that developer. Ahem!

Currently in game:

  • customizable player colors
  • 4 different breath types
  • complete level with custom textures and sprites made by me, Some Purple Dragon
  • 2 original tracks by the awesome literaysquirrel
  • completely original sound effects by silviobroschi
  • unique health and projectile mechanics ( as far as I'm aware of )

What will most likely come in the future:

  • around 30 different levels much bigger than the demo level each with their own themes
  • a completely original language used by the dragons
  • many new types of enemies with their own special mechanics
  • 3 overworlds from which to continue your adventures
  • around 20 different sound tracks

Come join our Discord server to track development of the game and leave suggestions and feedback! Hope to see you there and I hope you enjoy my game! 

https://discord.gg/U6KUPpe
